welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sankt Ingbert, a charming city known for its picturesque scenery and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ensheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zweibrücken Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zweibrücken Airport, primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ramstein Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for military and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
